meaning_str.bing:
n. 智慧；明智；才智；学问
网络. 睿智；名言；聪明

智慧；明智；理智；聪明；才智；精明；（社会或文化长期积累的）知识；见识；洞察力；判断力；学问；哲理；箴言

1.en: But Rancho did not go with the stream, he influenced other people by his kindness, broad-minded, humorous, wisdom.
1.cn: 而兰彻却不要随波逐流，他用他哒善良、开朗、幽母霈和聪明影响着四周哒人。

2.en: Today, I trying to listen to your wisdom, how's to get out of trouble.
2.cn: 今天，想听听你的智慧，都是如何摆脱困境。

3.en: So think about educating ourselves at lease to put a little bit of value in the wisdom.
3.cn: 所以，应该考虑一下如何教育我们自己要给“智慧”赋予哪怕一点点的价值。

0.en: We wish to partake of this information from your great hall of wisdom.
0.cn: 我们希望从您伟大的智慧殿堂里获得一些信息。

1.en: What is this place? This is where the ancients stored all of their wisdom.
1.cn: 这是什么地方啊？就是古人们储藏智慧的地方。

2.en: Well, not so much the Lake of Wisdom, it's more like the Lake of Whiz.
2.cn: 好吧，与其说是智慧之湖，看来叫做污秽之湖更合适。

3.en: No, no, no, no. Will I help you attain wisdom? Yes. That I will do.
3.cn: 不...别走别走，我会帮你们获得智慧的，当然，这个我能办到。

4.en: I know very well who you are. You are lost souls who have come here seeking wisdom.
4.cn: 我非常清楚你们是谁，你们是迷失的灵魂，前来这里想要寻求智慧。

5.en: What's this? The price. Soul holds a special place among the Infinity Stones. You might say it has a certain wisdom.
5.cn: 这是什么？代价。无限宝石中灵魂宝石很特别。可以说它有一定的智慧。

6.en: Can we have some? Wisdom is not something that is given. It is something that is attained. Okay. Goodbye.
6.cn: 你能给我们吗？智慧是不能从他人手中得到的，必须通过自己的努力来获取。好吧，再见。

7.en: And also I strongly believe(believe in) the future world, we are going to have a lot of women leaders, because in the future people will not only focus on muscles, powers, they(they will also) focus on wisdom, theythey(they will also) focus on careness and responsibility.
7.cn: 而且我强烈相信，在未来的世界，我们会有很多女性领袖，因为在未来人们将不会只关注在肌肉力量，而会更加重视智慧，重视关怀和责任。

8.en: I see you have found the Sacred Peach Tree of Heavenly Wisdom.
8.cn: 看来你已找到了天聪圣桃树。

9.en: Choose wisdom over wrath. Heal any rifts within yourself, your armies, your people.
9.cn: 选择智取而非力敌，治愈你自己，你的敌人和你的子民心中的裂痕。

10.en: While I appreciate your folksy tire wisdom, I don't appreciate what you're putting Mom through.
10.cn: 虽然我挺欣赏你的民间轮胎箴言，但我并不欣赏你让妈遭受的事。

11.en: My war is with South China, not with my wife and Empress. You know I heed your wisdom, but there's no more waiting!
11.cn: 我是要和南方打仗，不是要和你吵嘴，你知道我尊重你的意见，但我已等不下去了。

12.en: Oh, yes, you should have seen those young people. Thirsty for knowledge, drinking in my wisdom. I may have changed a few lives today.
12.cn: 可不是吗，你们真该亲眼看看那群孩子求知若渴，贪婪地聆听我的教诲，我今天也许改变了不少人的人生。

13.en: After paying your respects at the Big Buddha seek a little enlightenment along the Wisdom Path a trail dedicated to the centuries-old Buddhist scripture, the Heart Sutra.
13.cn: 参拜大佛后，您还可以沿着心经简林走走，这是一条以世代相传的佛教经文心经而建的步行径。

14.en: In the past, I've reached out to each of you individually, but I believe my present situation requires the collective wisdom of the group, which as you can see from your commemorative T-shirts I have dubbed Sheldon Cooper's Council of Ladies.
14.cn: 过去呢，我曾与在座各位有过单独请益的时刻，但这次我觉得这次的情况需要你们一起共同集思广益，想必你们从纪念T恤上也能看得出，我标注上了“谢尔顿·库伯姐妹顾问团”。
